values: my sincerest apologies for being MIA. Nao, love you. Pretty dissapointing that Ewan, Claire, Milla, and Gale got booted. Even so, I still talk to them frequently. So tell me...how are you crazy kids doing?
I got a puppy! Milla, do you think Madness would play with her sometimes? Her name's Diamonds. *huggles her to death*

I was rumaging through my old photo albums, and I came across my "Tom book". YES I still kept that. Well I looked through it and I found myself smiling FONDLY (not the evil smirk I wear when I mock his ass) at the pictures, almost MISSING him. Alright...I miss him a bit. I miss having someone, being able to trust that person fully, the way he was good with kids, the touch of another, the way I could tease him mercilessly and he'd still love me. But I DON'T miss him checking out every girl (and guy) at all the hollywood parties. And I DON'T miss how he'd fart like an earthquake and not even use air freshner. And I certainly don't miss the way he complained about everything. *slaps self* SNAP OUT OF IT WOMAN I guess I miss him a BIT, but really I miss having someone. Don't get me wrong, I'm not about to throw myself at a random guy, hit on a girl (NO EWAN), or go out with Johnny (again, NO EWAN) *snickers* Had to let out steam...I want new friends. People who need to call me: Sean, Lij, Stuart, Jay (havent heard from you in an eternity), KD (we share friends, we need to meet!), and anyone else who think they'd get along with me Love + Earthquakes, Nic
For you lij. Like it? I can do other people if I have time, so comment me and I'll try to make one for you.

*giggles to self and I pick up some clear nail polish. Opens the bottle and wrinkles nose slightly at the smell. Places the brush in my teeth and starts painting nails that way. Finishes, laughs and shakes hair around* Hi...wow, I usually update more than this. Guess I'm just busy. I'm listening to Pink's CD and it really gets you hyped to do things I've met Sean Astin and he seems really sweet. I also got in touch with NAOMI!!!!!!!!! (aussie naomi) I missed her so much and I'm so glad she's here. She and Johnny met, and I think I'll try and set them up. They both liked each other Two new icons! *throws them around* Gale made the one with me and Ew. Johnny made me one that says "COME AND GET ME BOYS" and it's a scene from MR, but I'm not sure if I should use that one. *laughs* Love + Lillies, Nicole

I just realized a fact that makes me feel proud,innocent,prude, and old at the same time. I am the ONLY person in all my circles of friends that hasn't had sex since they've been here Well...Johnny too, but he doesn't count because he could get some just by batting his eyelashes. He's just CHOSE not to go cavorting with some adoring chick (or Gale) I could go out and bang TOM but first of all, NO, second of all, EW, and third of all, PUKE. It's really not half as bad as it sounds, going without sex like this. Really! Love + My disgustingly angelic purity, Nicole <33333333333333

 Everyone needs to do this meme, because I was fooling around with it, and I suspect someone from AC made it. It's so funny and it has loads of AC people in it like Gale, Randy, me, Ewan, KD, AJ, etc. If you made it tell me so I can congradulate you! Love + Red Carpets, Nic

Let me start off by saying: Lei- I am SO sorry i had to leave so early, but I'm glad I came before the masses. <333 you. Johnny- I hate you. Die. Now. <3 Gale- Are you upset with me or something? You haven't returned my calls. Mmmkay...that works. You know "the topic" and how I went on about how we haven't talked since then??? Well my foot has just been strategically placed in my mouth, and I think I'm still blinking in confusion. He just called, started talking rapidly, and I just stood there with my mouth hanging open. I dont know WHY I'm "d-uhhh?", I was hoping it'd happen. List of people who need to call me: Gale, Shakira, Tori, Lij, Sean Astin (so I can meet you), Lei, EWAN. Love + Pink Ponies, Nic

Wow...I never thought a day would come where I actually had the HONOR of speaking on the phone with Ewan. *snorts and laughs* It was actually a very amusing conversation, talking about Humping Gorillas, Humping/running cows, Hicks, how Ewan will NOT get dumped, and "the topic."  

"the topic" is D-o-m. As I mentioned before, we...haven't talked since "then", and I've got a few "anonymous" people telling me to forget him, he's a jerk. Well I can probably  move on, but he is NOT a jerk. He never was, never will be. I was out with Chelsea Tyler, LaLaine, Amanda Williford, Chad MM, Shakira, Tom Welling, and some other people I forgot last night, and all of a sudden "the topic" popped into conversation. It was really random, and I may have been slightly tipsy, but I went on about how I missed having him as a friend...really quite embarassing I hope they all promptly forget it. 

*coughs* Okay, and I've GOT to clear this a bit...I mean, it's really none of my beeswax but...*clears throat* Gale...Ewan did NOT mean that garbage he wrote on his stupid laptop...he loves YOU and i know you love him VERY much or else you wouldn't have gotten so upset. Ermm, perlease dont be cross with me, I just hate to see friends unhappy.

niCKY (as in HILTON): You are SO a dumb blonde! *laughs* No, but I love you anyways, you're so terrific. It was great talking to you. 

Love + Paperclips,

Nicole

All this breaking up and divorce. *closes eyes, rubs temples with two fingers* It makes me SICK. Just when I start believing in true love, all these relationships just screw themselves.  Ewan and Gale don't count...they're so in love, they're like one person...Gewalen? God...*shakes head and tries to laugh* I thought some of these couples would be together...forever maybe? *shrugs* whatever...not like I care... *bites lower lip until it bleeds* 

I've become all moody-like and depressed recently and it's ALL BECAUSE OF YOU GUYS! *smiles a little* Kidding...but really, all this splitting up and breaking friends...It feels like the only people I can trust are Gewalen *giggles and hiccups*, Johnny, Nicky, Claire, and Leila. *snaps fingers* And Luce.

I mean, I can't trust Damon for obvious reasons, Jay and I just stopped talking, Dom is treating me like I have a disease because I had a little episode where I liked him (which is OVER in case you haven't noticed), and Renee ran...like I ALMOST did
*holds up hands* NOT.A.WORD. I'm not leaving, and just in case you're wondering, it had zip to do with Dom or Ren. 

I've burbled enough 

Love + whatever,

N

P.S. Thanks for the icon Gale (Gewalen?) I'll upload it later...it's awesome I love it

Claire got us all an island...*blinks* I wouldve been like WHOA if she just got us a bus. I should be happier but I'm too busy wallowing in my own self problems and only thinking of myself as usual.

-_- Actually that's not true. Sure, I've been thinking of myself a bit, but that's because I think I'm seriously in need of psychological help. Okay, even if there's something that makes ME happy, I get happier if I see someone else happy...did that make sense? Okay, I prefer to see other people enjoying themselves than me. I get all spazzed whenever I see a sweet couple like Ewan/Gale, Lucy/Dom, Claire/Brandon, but I'm supposed to get all emo that I dont have someone, but...I dont. And on top of that I never try to meet anyone "special" I'm happy just "awww"ing over everyone ELSE.

I definitly need a therapist

Go say hi to my new friend NickyTheHilton. Especially you Dom, you'll get a kick out of her. Go...now...*waves arms around*

Love + uh...something,

Nic

I feel...

TERRIFIC! 

I've got control back, I handled a situation well for once, and I managed not to kill Gale because he told the world something I wouldve rather kept private.

Speaking of Gale, I'm flying home soon and visiting you loaded with flowers, cards, candy, whatever. And if you're discharged by then, I'll bring em to your house...I'll be there whether you want me or not.

Nikki's back...no more confusion, no more losing it, no more nothing. The Dom situation went exactly as I'd thought (horribly) but  y'know what? I don't even feel bad...about myself that is...a little stupid for possibly wrecking a terrific friendship, but if we're meant to be friends it'll come together. I know it will.

Feeling great,

NICOTINE (hah much love Depp)

This will be BY FAR the most embarrassing moment in my long life. (And that includes when a drunk Ewan told the whole bar I was a whore and they could have me for 10 $...c'mon McGregor I'm worth SO much more than 10...Hah, had to have that bit of comedy)

I'm just taking Johny and Tori's advice to just CLEAR THIS DAMN THING UP! Okay...as half the planet nows *coughcoughGALEcough* I...*searches for words* was...*shakes head* okay if I;m going to be honest...AM a bit...quite...attracted to...yeah...Dom. 

I wasn't at first...in fact I didnt even like him...you could even say I...was amazed at what a...I believe I called him a "fathead" one time. *sighs* I didn't wanna be another one of his admirers, I really didn't and I tryed not to...I tryed really hard. All I wanted was to be his friend, to have someone to talk to, but the moment he was a teensy bit sweet to me I had to go of like "OHMAHGAWD! <33333"  *weak laugh* I'm such a dork right?

Dom: I know this is really overwhelming and...unwanted...*laughs* But really, just because I had to develope a crush on you doesn't mean it should...*rolls eyes* uh pop our friendship balloon? It'd kill me if things became akward between us, so...yes...

THERE! I said it! Now everyone continue with their lives!

Love + tomatoes,

Nic

Johnny rang me after he brought his ASB's (Adorable Spoiled Brats)
back home from the zoo (aww he's such a good dad...) And we went for a walk past Big Ben, because I'm such the tourist. 

It was all going fine and dandy until he had to bring up "the subject"  and then try to give me useful friendly advice (the gall of him *laughs weakly*) Since we're both so hotheaded, we argued, I knew he was right, he knew he was right, I said something rude,  dashed away, and ended up taking a cab back to the hotel.

As I told Ewan, I went for a drive, stopped at a bakery, ate until the cows came home, and drove back again. Yet, Johnny's words keep ringing in my head like an important phrase does in a cheesy movie. 

Runzwithskizz0rz: You're a great girl and my best friend, but you always look before you leap...and you can be the biggest pessimest and pain in my ass. -puts out cigarrette and tosses it on the side of the road-

Thank youuu Johnny! Always painfully honest, and while we're at it, you are soooo arrogant, you think the world revolves around you, and get SO amazingly irritating. *sighs* call me tomorow before you leave.

-Nicole

*wakes up from sleeping curled up on the floor next to computer. Yawns, stretches and blinks multiple times before booting up the laptop. Crosses legs into a pretzel and logs on*

This is crazy. Yesterday (except for one factor) I had total control over my life, and I knew what was going on. In less than nine hours, I'm confused, scared, helpless, and so on.

*the phone rings and I get up to answer it. Talks for a few moments, almost crying at some points, doing a lot of nodding. Hangs up after a while and continues typing*

That was my new friend Tori Amos. She is terrific with advice, so i suggest you all go visit her at fairyqueen_amos. 

I'm in desparate need of a mocha frapp, so I'll talk to you all sometime...

Love,

Nicole
*blinks* Would someone care to explain what just happened in our dear Johnny's LJ?

READ CAREFULLY

Yesterday I was moping about my life...I mean, I can't tell this person how I feel because I'm afraid it'll jeapordize our friendship, I'm afraid Milla and Ewan's friendship will shatter because of the whole "Gale getting beat up"  thing,the fact that all the salespeople talk about my big feet, the way Milla says the "minions" all love me but my permanent doubt is still hanging over saying "what if they dont" and all the other shite going on in my life is just too overwhelming, so I literally lost in and started crying my miserable eyes out.

I ended up going over to Johnny's and spending the night. Clear all perversions from your mind because this was a traditional girly sleepover. I whined about my problems a bit, he let me paint his nails (honestly johnny you can be SUCH the queer), and we listened to B*witched. Remember them? We also choreographed a dance to "Cest la Vie" which involves a bunch of gyrating and gang gestures. We had so much fun and the B*witched song "Rev it up" is now our girly little "friendship song"
Thank you Johnny I love you.

Dom: I seem to take you for granted a bunch, but I want you to know you are one of my best friends, and that I love you tons. I've kept my mouth shut about you-know-what, and it will stay that way. You're my Icy peach, my blues clues buddy, my sunshine. *blinks* That was sappier than I usually get, but I guess reading "A time for Dancing" has it's tolls.

Oh  and vote for the AC awards everyone! It's fun even if it reminds me of high school superlatives. And thanks to Leila (who voted me sweetest person :-*) Claire (who voted me most beautiful), and Johnny (who voted me most beautiful and best eyes) 

Love,

Nic

<font size=32>COMMENT ME!

Quoting Renee:

"Whew...Drama, Drama, Drama."

There's this crazy sitch going on with Ewan/Gale/Damon, and all I've gotta say about that is: GAHHH! *runs around the room screaming and throwing skittles and smacks everyone* 'Nuff said.

*clears throat* Umm...THANK YOU SOOOOOO MUCH JOHNNY I LUV YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! <33 *laughs* Only he knows why I'm thanking him. He is the sweetest.  Oh and speaking of Depp, who thinks him and Natalie Portman would be cute??? Him and Leila??? Him and...??

Ummm...I might be throwing a costume party (just for the hell of it) sometime...comments? 

Love + Goat Milk,

Nic

It's so ultimatly frusterating! I dont WANT to like him but I just DO and I could kick myself for it. 

Anyways...I'll be spending the day at "Food for Others" picking fruit as a volunteer. Bugs, cramps, sweat, etc. But I'll feel accomplished so that's all that matters.

I've got two donations and I've found their messages very funny.

1.Johnny Depp-For Nicotine So she'll love me more than Dom
2.Icy Peach-Just to make sure you love me more than Depp

*mwa* Thanks to both of you I feel very very special.

Matt and Claire: I might be able to break free sometime like sat or sun. Available??

Love + MonkeyShines,

Nic

Well, today Claire and I were going to fly to Prague to <strike> have sex with Matt + Heath </strike> But she couldnt go, so I'll wait for a time when she's available. (I got intimidated)

Oh and Jay, thanks for donating! *laugh*

<font size=32>

LOVE YA MUCH DEPP! <3333333

I've made four new friends since I;ve come back from NYC! Makes me wish I'd bought them something

1.Elijah Wood (he's so gorgeous *laughs)
2.Ultimate Rock God Jay Gordon
3.Leila (soooo awesome! We did lunch and it was fun!)
4.Matt Damon (he's cute too *giggles maniaclly*

Okay I'm starting project "GET A GODDAMN GIRLFRIEND (for Johnny) aka GAGG. (Sorry Gale, but he's a woman <3er)  Here are some girls I think would suit my Johnny.

Natalie Portman (sorry again Gale, I still think it'd be cute, but it probably wont happen since they havent met), Geri Halliwell, Claire, Milla, Leila, Lucy. 

*sighs* WHY DOESNT SOMEBODY SET NIKKI UP??? *kicks depp* I'm going to all this trouble for you, can't you pull some strings and get me a date to the *checks list* nope, I've got Dom on a leash for the oscars, nevermind.

Oh and btw, I'm a member of that "oral donations" thing so if anyone wants to make their Nikki feel special  donate away.

Love for my new friends (and my old ones too),

Nicole <3

Dom is a sneaky, manipulative, tricky, lowlife, underhanded, dastardly, jerkwad creep who lead me into the smoking temptation. *glares daggers* Yet we all love him anyhoo.

*clears throat* Well I called Jay Gordon (orgy)and he's SO cool. I get to be his fangirlie. *grin* Go visit him, his username's Jay_gordon

<underline> Nikki @ the moment </underline>

Eating: Quaker Oats brown sugar cinnamon Breakfast Square
Drinking: Nothing...Im thirsty though
Listening: Weezer
Watching: The fifth element
reading: what I'm writing...but I just finished "The Lovely Bones"
Thinking: JayJayJayJayiwonderwhatcamefirst,eggorchickenJayJayJay
Today: I'm going to see Freaky Friday with a girlfriend and her niece.

Love + Oatmeal,

Nicole

I'm back! Fabulous time in NYC. I bought y'all shite which I will promptly post below. I heard about the wedding reception, and I'm sorry and I love you two. Speaking of which, Mr. McGregor, you'd better use and treasure my icon or I'll...do something mean................... Dom says that Jay is here from the band Orgy. *grins* I <3 THAT BAND! Candyass has a special place in my stereo. Speaking of Dommie, we are the best of friends yet again and I love him. Kyla, you take MY advice and go screw a cow...actually, spare the cow and screw yourself. I havent gotten laid in like...a month...anyone wanna help? (joke kids, joke) Dom-have fun peach... Eliza-I thought this was just SO cute Ewan-I got you the outfit not the man XD Gale-SO hot...*laughs* Renee-you will look SO amazingly adorable in this... Milla- Sexay...prowrrr Lucy- these will look SO gorgeous on you Luce Claire- SUCH good perfume...I wasnt trying to imply you smell bad though! :-* Johnny- Sexual encounters wif giraffes! MWAH! (inside joke lol) Love + jet lag, Nix

I guess I'm going to New York without straightening ANYTHING out with Dom because he hasn't called. *feels bad* well I didn't call him either did I...but I'm not the one who's SUPPOSED to...yes I am...No I'm NOT.

I didn't get a call goodbye from anyone else either, or an email from E. I DID get an ooc call from Gale which was VERY nice. *glares at everyone who's name isn't Gale* 

Well...jesus, call me before I go! It'd be teriffic to talk to you before I embark on my week long shopping bonanza in NYC. Phone #: <strike> Diamondkitty619</strike>

Love + Non Existent phone calls,

Nicole

((Oh and if I'm not home a goodbye email would be appreciated too: Diamondkitty619@aol.com))

Arg.Blarg.Urgafritz.

I'm just so confused, confused, confused. I've got all these people telling me "Dom would never do that...It's gotta be that Tylene chick or Kylie." And then I got "Wasn't me" from Dom himself. But...HOW THE *CENSORED BECAUSE I'M CLASSY LIKE THAT* DID THAT GIRL KNOW ABOUT WHAT I TALKED ABOUT??? I DIDNT TELL ANYONE!!! ENOUGH CAPS!!!!!!!!!

*gets headache* ah the confusion of it all. Listen, I'm gonna be away for a week (and missing ewans wedding reception =( sorry Ew, Love ya!) 
so I want you lot to CALL ME and say goodbye! All of you! <strike> diamondkitty619</strike> Ewan if you can't call I expect an email mister. 

Love + Confusion,

Nicole

I'm just feeling so miserable, miserable, miserable.


1. Lucy's sad, and when someone I care about is sad, it automatically makes me gloomy.

2. This girl named Kyla who claims to be Dom's friend keeps calling me and telling me I should stop talking to him if I know what's good for me because he backstabs everybody, and he already talks trash about me. She knew alot of what I said so I'm not sure who I believe, but I definitly WANT to belive Dom...

3. I can't access Mr.Mcgregor's LJ so I STILL don't know the secret

On a lighter note...Seabiscuit was terrific.

Love + tissues,

Nicole

Ewan, I still need to know "the secret" It's killing me. You know how when you're really sad it feels like your heart is breaking? Well i never feel that way...except when my friends do. Lucy, I know we haven't talked THAT much, but I hate seeing you sad, I really do. Call if you want to talk, but you don't have to. I wont call you just in case you don't wanna talk. 2 my Icy Peach: There's something I sort of haven't told you, and it might be kind of...I dont know...just call me PLEASE, it's really not a big deal but...Um, I know you're a bit upset @ the moment, just call...or if I'm not home email: Diamondkitty619@aol.com Just plain Love, Nicole xoxoxox Oh and Luce, here's a pathetic attempt to make you slightly happier... Your own barbie! lol <333

Phone Booth sucked...I feel like making a few people happy...I'm SO glad you like the icon Ewan...I love you Renee...Dom...Luce...Milla.. Depp...Gale...Randy...everyone... OMG Ewan the caption for this picture was: Nicole Kidman and Ewan McGregor share a joke laugh at the futility of it all or perhaps about the size of Tom Cruise's cuban heels. So delighting it'll run for fifty yeaaaaars...check out Leguizimo... It's blurry but it's the beloved hobbits...if you wanna see them in skintight wetsuits click there. Milla who is this guy...he's yummy looking... That's all...and I found this Dom-Obsessive site: http://www.thefairestlady.com/dom/ Love + overwhelming Icey peaches, Nicole

I'm so happy with everyone. *runs around hugging everybody* Everyone's happy again and that makes Nikki feel warm and squishy inside *giggles like a school girl* 

I just bought a McDonalds burger and got a free pair of 3D glasses...everythings all blurry now that I've taken them off. Isn't this dangerous for little kids?

I rented Phone Booth, and will be watching it tonight though I will probably piss my pants and be afraid to answer my phone. *laughs* I'll be even worse when I go see Freddy vs Jason...still wanna take me Dom? *grins* 

IM JUST SO GODDAMN GIDDY!!!! *giggles again* If anyone want to talk to me (psshh yeah right XD) call me: <strike> diamondkitty619 </strike>

Love + Colin Farrel,

Nicole

P.S for Depp: Here's the public confession you wanted me to give: I do not hate Johnny. Johnny is a great guy. Johnny may be an egosistical <strike> jerk </strike> person, but I dont hate Johnny. Johnny's my friennnnd XD Anways, thats all. <33

Wow...last night was totally killer, yet part of me feels guilty about Gale even though I didnt so much as shake hands with Ewan. *sigh* Gale if you read this, Ewan didn't stay...he stopped when it started getting heavy. You have my word. 

Oh and Johnny, I was a wee bit drunk last night, and that doesn't mean I like you -_-;;;r

Luce, the whole things seems fun to do, lets just find someone who we can work over without feeling guilty. Well...you work over, I make mean remarks and get hit every so often...

As I said...fun yet guilty, and I hope yu understand Gale. Ewan loves you, and we didnt do anything.

Love + Onions,

Nicole

This entry's devoted entirely to give Ewan a few laughs.I stumbled across a whole SITE of Ewan/Ewan related quotes, and I'm listing a few of my favorites.
<font color=red>
"I use to say she was a skanky whore, which really pissed her off. But, yes. She plays a courtesan. A high-class whore. A high-class skanky whore." ~Ewan on Nicole Kidman's character in Moulin Rouge 
<font color=white>
"I'd say, 'You're meant to be in love with me! You cannot refer to
me as a skanky old whore!' And he'd go, 'Oh yeah...Sorry." ~Nicole Kidman on working with Ewan in Moulin Rouge 

"I hated Clueless with a passion. I thought it would have been a really good film if someone had blown her head off at the end with a really huge gun. I mean, this rich bitch suddenly becomes charitable and then she's okay? And then there's the token black friend. It was so corrupt, so L.A., I hated it." ~Ewan in Teen Magazine, September 

"An airport customs inspector once recognised me from Trainspotting 
and strip searched me looking for drugs."~Ewan
<font color=red>
"My dad saw my full package in Pillow Book and said, 'I'm glad to see you inherited one of my major attributes.'" 
 <font color=green>OMFG I laughed SO hard @ this one! 

<font color=white>
"I smoke a lot. I drink far too much-I don't excercise. I torture small animals." ~Ewan on his sex appeal. 

"Ewan was the clumsiest. Every take, something would fall off his 
costume or he'd drop his lightsaber." -Stunt coordinator Nick Gillard 
<font color=red>
"Could have been edited by a crack-addicted ferret with 
ADD who just downed a half dozen Pixie Stix."-review of Moulin Rouge
<font color=white>
"Actually, I really want to play Princess Leia. Stick some big pasteries on my head. Now that would be interesting." ~on his casting in the 'Star Wars Prequel' 

"People have actually said to me, 'May the Force be with you'. I think that's quite batty." 
<font color=red>
"I'm just looking for that moment to drop my Jedi knickers and pull out my real light saber." 
<font color=white>

Well THAT was fun wasn't it kids?  Here's the site if you wanna see them all Ewan: http://www.karenmarshall.com/ewanquotes.htm Actually, I was feeling kinda rotten after the salespeople mocked me, but these actually made me feel better. 

Love + Old Movies,

Nicole

I took Ewan's advice and bought Mistress supplies I had to go with Classy Mistress...bit of 'o oxymoron I thought you might like this Dom... For Milla's doggeh... I hope you two like your little presents. Love + 3D glasses, Nicole

I'm updating simply because I can.Well, I've pleased someone today, therefore I made the world a happier place. Dominic needs to get his ass back here, I'm bored as hell. And just in case you read this Mr.Monaghan, I do NOT have sexual frusteration *rakes hands through hair* Arggg...

Oh and since I haven't officially welcomed you, WELCOME Johnny Depp, although with all your female adoration I doubt you'll have time to read this anyways. *laughs*

Renee and I were looking for a new icon or two for her, and we went to google and typed in "renee zellweger LJ icons". Well, all we found was nude pictures of her.

Renee: THOSE ARE NOT MINE!!! AND NEITHER IS THAT!!! 

*dies laughing* funny funny.

Well...that's all folks...ciao...for now...

Love + Basketball,

Nicole
Happy? Arggggggg...

Ahhhh Ewan, looking grittier than you did last year. *shrugs* Dont ask, you just do...you used to have a kind of little boy spark in your eyes and now your eyes make me nervous...kinda like your plotting to hit me with a Bannanas in Pajama's doll when I least suspect it.
